detail_desc: Straight-cut sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One pair with an all-over print.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Thin socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with D-rings. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a press-stud at the back, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Top in a cotton weave with a wide neckline and wide, rounded short sleeves. Wide smocking with a small frill trim at the top and a narrow, detachable tie belt under the bust.
Metal earrings in various designs decorated with faceted plastic and glass beads. Length approx. 3.5 cm and approx. 14 cm.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in a sturdy linen and cotton blend with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in soft cotton with small, knitted ears at the top.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Cap in a cotton weave with concealed elastication at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small, frilled stand-up collar, buttons at the top, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem.

Wide trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with wide belt loops, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the front. Low crotch, a zip fly, side pockets and patch back pockets with a button. Wide legs that taper slightly at the hems.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in a stretch weave with a seam at the bust and concealed zip at the back.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with gathers below the knees and a zip at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front. Long sleeves and flounces at the front that continue over the back of the shoulders.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

prod_name: Petite Perrie slim mom denim T
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut blouse in printed woven fabric with a slightly wider neckline and buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in marled sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Shorts in denim made from a cotton blend. High paper bag waist with covered elastication, a small frill trim and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly and buttons, and front and back pockets.

Blouse in an airy weave with a burnout pattern. Small, frilled stand-up collar, a smocked yoke and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.
Slightly wider-fitting jumper in a soft pattern knit with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style cardigan knitted in soft wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front and two patch front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that join into a lace back section, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long, balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Trousers in a sturdy weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey pyjamas in a soft viscose and cotton blend. Loose-fitting top with a print motif on the front and shorts with partly covered elastication at the waist.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, leg pockets with a flap and button and slim legs.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Chelsea boots in grained leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a smocked bodice and a narrow, elasticated trim around the square neckline. Short puff sleeves with smocking at the hems, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Rib-knit hat in a double layer of soft cotton with an appliqué on the sewn-in turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pyjamas in soft satin with a strappy top and bottoms. Top with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck satin blouse with short cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front, gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.

Oversized shirt in soft cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and button placket.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Boots in patterned canvas with an ankle-height shaft with lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.

Small, rectangular shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and a flap with a concealed, magnetic press-stud fastener. Imitation suede lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 22 cm.
